form-property.name: no_paren_scrub
form-property.initial: name, support_policy, summary, description, maintainer_phone, maintainer_name

form-property.name: no_paren_scrub
form-property.initial: system_name, description, address1, address2, city, room, rack

set-property.value: user_role(org_admin); system_feature(ftr_proxy_capable) or system_is_proxy(); org_channel_family(rhn-proxy) or system_is_proxy(); child_channel_candidate(rhn-proxy) or system_is_proxy(); not system_is_satellite(); system_feature(ftr_kickstart) or system_feature(ftr_snapshotting)
